text: Teruaki "Jimmy" Murakami, (村上輝明 Murakami Teruaki, June 5, 1933 – February 16, 2014) was a Japanese American animator and director. He is best-known for the animated adaptations of the Raymond Briggs books When the Wind Blows and The Snowman. He formed Murakami-Wolf Films with Fred Wolf. He died in 2014, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American movie directors Category:American animators Category:People from San Jose, California
title: Jimmy Murakami
